rfm12_rfrxbuf_t Struct Reference

The receive buffer structure for the amplitude modulated receive feature. More...

#include <rfm12.h>

Data Fields

volatile uint8_t p
 A pointer into the buffer, used while receiving.
volatile uint8_t state

uint8_t buf [RFM12_ASK_RFRXBUF_SIZE]
 The data buffer.

Detailed Description

The receive buffer structure for the amplitude modulated receive feature.

Note:
You need to define RFM12_RECEIVE_ASK as 1 to enable this.
See also:
ask_rxbuf (for further usage instructions) and ISR(ADC_vect, ISR_NOBLOCK)

Field Documentation

uint8_t buf[RFM12_ASK_RFRXBUF_SIZE]

The data buffer.

volatile uint8_t p

A pointer into the buffer, used while receiving.

volatile uint8_t state

The buffer's state.

See also:
See ASK mode defines for a list of possible states
